install.name: Content - pPGallery
install.author: CS
install.copyright: This plugin is released under the GNU/GPL License
install.description: Content-Plugin to create an simple image gallery based on 'prettyPhoto' display engine (a jQuery lightbox clone). Images from folders or directly inserted into the content/article can be processed with automatic thumbnail generation. Install and activate this plugin as usual. Insert {ppgallery}*folder* or *images*{/ppgallery} in the content/article where the gallery shall appear. More detailed information about each parameter setting and inline override parameters can be found in the popup help text of the plugin parameter settings pane or via "http://joomlacode.org/gf/project/ppgallery/". [Bundled with prettyPhoto 2.5.6 and jQuery 1.3.2]

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description:
State the maximum width of thumbnails (in px without the unit).
[width=]

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description:
State the maximum height of thumbnails (in px without the unit).
[height=].

param.name: fixed_w
param.label: Fiexed thubmnail spacing
param.description:
State if all thumbnail-'boxes' shall have the same width (portrait-image-thumbnails will occupy the same space as the landscape thumbs).
[fixed_w=]-[0|1] (0=no, 1=yes)

param.name: quality_jpg
param.label: JPG thumbnail quality
param.description:
State the desired quality for jpg thumbnail generation in percent (without '%' sign).
(0-100)
[quality_j=]

param.name: quality_png
param.label: PNG thumbnail quality
param.description:
State the desired compression-rate for png thumbnail generation.
(0-9)
[quality_p=]

param.name: padd_h
param.label: Horizontal padding
param.description:
State the desired lateral padding between thumbnails (in px without the unit).
[padding_h=]

param.name: padd_v
param.label: Vertical padding
param.description:
State the desired vertical padding between thumbnails (in px without the unit).
[padding_v=]

param.name: caption
param.label: Caption
param.description:
State if a caption (taken from the images 'alt'-tag) shall be displayed with the thumbnail.
[caption=]-[none|top|label|bottom]

param.name: t_limit
param.label: No. of thumbnails
param.description:
State the max. number of thumbnails to be shown on the content/item page (the remaining images will be displayed in the gallery, of course!). Leave blank to show all images. When choosing '0' no thumbnails will generated at all, only the scripts for prettyPhoto will be loaded (in this case prettyPhoto engine can be used as 'standalone' and the links have to be entered as described on the prettyPhoto homepage!)
[limit=]

param.name: pre_txt
param.label: Prefix text
param.description:
The inserted text will be displayed in front of all image-descriptions.
[prefix_txt=]

param.name: lnk_pop
param.label: Link popup text
param.description:
The inserted text will always be displayed as link popup text when moving the cursor overhead a thumbnail image. If left blank either the 'caption-text' (taken from the images 'alt'-tag) or the filename will be used.
[link_popup=]

param.name: t_only
param.label: Thumbnails only
param.description:
State if only thumbnails shall be displayed, in this case PrettyPhoto Gallery will not be used.
[t_only=]-[0|1] (0=no, 1=yes)

param.name: ppTitle
param.label: Show title
param.description: Select weather or not the 'caption-text' (taken from the images 'alt'-tag) or the filename shall be displayed as title at the top of the image-box.

param.name: ppResize
param.label: Allow resize
param.description: Select if the image will be displayed in real-size or will fit into the window (in this case a zoom-button is available in the top right corner).

param.name: ppSep
param.label: Separator label for image counter
param.description: Insert the desired separator letter or word for the gallery image counter (e.g. 1 'of' 7 or 1'/'7).

param.name: ppTheme
param.label: Theme
param.description: Choose the desired themes.

param.name: ppAni
param.label: Animation speed
param.description: Select the desired speed for the image-box to appear.

param.name: ppOpac
param.label: Background opacity
param.description: Select the desired opacity factor for the background fading. [0-1] (0=no opacity, 1=black)

param.name: ppHidef
param.label: Hide flash objects
param.description: Select 'yes' if flash objects appear over prettyPhoto display box and background.

param.name: plgstring
param.label: Plugin string
param.description:
Attention: use with caution!
Insert the desired plugin string (content/article string between the {...}) to be used for identifying the gallery in the content/article (only useful when already having large amount of images used with other gallery plugins).

param.name: noconflict
param.label: No-Conflict mode
param.description: Select 'yes' if jQuery 'no conflict' mode shall be activated (e.g. with 'purity' based templates or other javascript based extensions).
